welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gelsenkirchen! This charming city is known for its rich industrial history, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Gelsenkirchen has to offer.

restaurants.name: Plaza Madrid
restaurants.description: Plaza Madrid is a spanish restaurant located in Gelsenkirchen.

restaurants.name: Trulli
restaurants.description: Trulli is a italian restaurant located in Gelsenkirchen.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, primarily used for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
